column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Food: good. For spicy lovers
column2: definitely go with the Spicy Tonkotsu Ramen
column3: spicy level hot. If you order anything else
column4: definitely ask for thick noodles if the ramen doesn't come with it. I swear you won't regret it. For appetizers
column5: I recommend the Crispy Chicken Wings. If you're tempted to order the Pork Gyoza
column6: I'd say skip it: it's not enough for the price.
